plot: A short film about a grandmother and granddaughter growing old and up together. We see not only what the old can teach the young, but what the younger generation has to share with their elders.
title: Belle & Emma
plot_es: A short film about a grandmother and granddaughter growing old and up together. We see not only what the old can teach the young, but what the younger generation has to share with their elders.
